verses.roman:
ghāṭa chāḍi' kata-dūre jala-sannidhāne
vasi' prabhu kare kṛṣṇa-nāma-saṅkīrtane

synonyms: ghāṭa chāḍi'-leaving the bathing place; kata-dūre—a short distance away; jala-sannidhāne—near the water; vasi'-sitting; prabhu—the Lord; kare—does; kṛṣṇa-nāma-saṅkīrtane—chanting of the holy name of Lord Kṛṣṇa.
translation: After bathing in the river, the Lord walked a little distance from the bathing place and engaged in chanting the holy name of Kṛṣṇa.
